Articles.Content:
I recently finished my master thesis with the title 'Highly Integrated Flow Sensor for a Sample Analysis System for Planetary Exploration', I thought a lot about who to dedicate my thesis to, you know, in the first pages you write something like To my dear Mother and Farther, without you bla bla bla or you have a quotation or something like that. I considered my parents, my brother, my partner and my supervisor, all of them more then worthy, but as this is space science, kerbonaut #0001 was a given choice. To Jebediah, fly safe 

http://uu.diva-portal.org/smash/record.jsf?pid=diva2:941418
